```{r 040107setup, include=FALSE}
## 040107 ->- Binomial random variable X ~ B(n, p), find find P(X >= a). 
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(MASS)

signifDig = 4

sol=0
a=2
n=1
while(is.na(sol)|(abs(sol)<0.00001)|(abs(sol)>0.999)|(a>n)){
  n <- sample(2:15, 1)
  a <- sample(1:3,1)
  p <- sample(3:7,1)/10
  sol = signif(1 - pbinom(a - 1, size=n, prob=p), digits=signifDig)
}




## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))

```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("$X$ is a binomial random variable of type $B(", n, ", ", p,")$. Find the probability $$P(X \\geq  ", a,").$$ Use  ", signifDig, " significant digits in your answer.")
  
answer=paste0("The answer is ", sol)

```


```{r eval=(language == "es"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}

answer=paste0("La respuesta es ", sol)
```
